question: [File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Upgrade compatibility] [Version format change] If the Version type changes or its comparison semantics change, can the old_version <= new_version check at line 93 fail causing cache corruption? (Medium)

[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Upgrade compatibility] [StateViewId enum extension] If new StateViewId variants are added, will the pattern match at lines 84-91 handle them correctly or cause unexpected cache flushes? (Low)

[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Cryptographic] [RNG predictability] Is thread_rng() at line 138 using a cryptographically secure RNG, or can predictable random sequences be exploited to target specific validators? (Low)

[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Move VM integration] [VM environment consistency] When AptosVM::new() is called at line 160 with vm_validator_locked.state.environment, can the environment be stale or inconsistent with the state_view? (High)

[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Move VM integration] [Module loader state] Does the CachedModuleView share module loader state across validations, and can this cause non-deterministic validation results? (High)

[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Resource management] [DbReader lifecycle] The Arc<dyn DbReader> is cloned multiple times (lines 50, 132) - does the DbReader hold resources (file handles, connections) that could be exhausted? (Medium)

[File: vm-validator/src/vm_validator.rs] [Resource management] [CachedModuleView growth] Does CachedModuleView have bounded growth, or can it accumulate modules indefinitely causing memory exhaustion? (Medium)
